name: Not Again (metehankutlu)
description:
Made for Rain Jam

Rhythm based game. Use left, down and right arrow keys. If you successfully hit the notes you accelerate, if you miss you decelerate.

The story is about a racer who had an accident in a race 4 years ago. He/she thinks it's the time to get back to racing but like the day accident happened it's raining. I wanted to make the game atmospheric as much as I can. I hope you enjoy it!

Music from: 

https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/elevate

Rain sound from:

https://www.soundjay.com/rain-sound-effect.html

Background images from:

https://itch.io/t/215888/parallax-horizontal-game-backgrounds-free

https://pixelgameart.org/web/portfolio/country-side-platfformer/

Created by following tutorials from:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-45osdbdNgY&list=PLFfOQnFRDk-wl6DtdWCA-cTQlK7SM_sqZ&index=1

Used MBOY Editor to create the note map
